title: Ukrainian military had 50 combat engagements with Russian forces near Bilohorivka of Luhansk region, Terny, Yampolivka, and n...
content: Ukrainian military had 50 combat engagements with Russian forces near Bilohorivka of Luhansk region, Terny, Yampolivka, and north to Vesele of Donetsk region, Ivanivske, Bohdanivka, Klischiyivka of Donetsk region, Berdychi, Semenivka and Pervomayske of Donetsk region, Novomykhaylivka, Staromayorske of Donetsk region, Robotyne and north-west Verbove of Zaporizhzhia region, Krynky of Kherson region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
